# LOAD DATA
```{r echo=FALSE, results='hide', message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
result_path = "../results/"

read.al <- function(path) {
  df <- read.csv(path, sep=",",header=T, dec=".")
  return (df)
}
piloto = read.al(paste(result_path, "piloto.csv", sep=""))

mean(piloto$response_time)
median(piloto$response_time)
sd(piloto$response_time)
```
